com.noctarius.borabora.spi.query.optimizer

Interface QueryOptimizerStrategy


  • public interface QueryOptimizerStrategy
    The QueryOptimizerStrategy interface describes a strategy on how to apply different QueryOptimizers to optimize the actual query. A QueryOptimizerStrategy is created using a QueryOptimizerStrategyFactory and the provided set of optimizers given to the factory instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PipelineStage optimizeQuery(PipelineStage rootPipelineStage, PipelineStageFactory pipelineStageFactory)
      This method executes the bound set of QueryOptimizers.

    • Method Detail

      • optimizeQuery

        PipelineStage optimizeQuery(PipelineStage rootPipelineStage,
                            PipelineStageFactory pipelineStageFactory)
        This method executes the bound set of QueryOptimizers. Depending on the strategy implementation certain optimizers might get a higher priority than others. All rules and priorities applied are completely independent specific. The default implementation just applied optimizers in the order they were registered.
        Parameters:
        rootPipelineStage - the PipelineStage to optimize
        pipelineStageFactory - the factory to create new PipelineStage instances
        Returns:
        the optimized PipelineStage
